title: The Enchanted Castle
description: When Jerry, Jimmy, and Kathleen are forced to spend their entire summer at school they don't imagine they will have a particularly interesting time. But that's before they stumble upon a mysterious castle set in beautiful, abandoned gardens. Could this really be an enchanted castle? With the air thick with magic and a maze hiding a sleeping girl at its center, the holidays might just be looking up. Includes exclusive content, including more information about the author and an Enchanted Castle quiz!
author: E. Nesbit
